violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Limit the number of people to less than or equal to 1000.

violations.description: No persons should be nearby unless they have badges of colors green, light blue, dark blue, purple, orange.
violations.recommendation: Ensure that only authorized personnel are in the restricted zone.

violations.description: Flag unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
violations.recommendation: Inspect unattended items and ensure they are not suspicious.

violations.description: Flag any fighting, running, or aggressive gestures.
violations.recommendation: Implement a zero-tolerance policy for aggressive behavior.

violations.description: All persons in work zones must wear required PPE (hard hat, vest).
violations.recommendation: Ensure all personnel are wearing the required PPE.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant with several security rules. The risk score indicates a high level of risk to safety and security.
